title: Rump of lamb, white beans and courgette flowers with marjoram and feta
description: Give your Sunday roast a summery twist with a herby crust, fried courgette flowers and a feta salad.
ingredients: 2 x 250g/9oz lamb rump, with fat attached
salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 x 400g tin butter beans in water, heated in a saucepan until warm
1 large banana shallot, peeled and sliced on a mandoline into very thin rings
100g/3½oz pitted large black or purple olives
1 lemon, cut into wedges, to serve
